title: Senior Staff Accountant
full_description: Accounting Principals is looking for a Senior Staff Accountant in Austin, Texas. This will be a blended remote/in office roe and will start immediately. The role will pay $55-60K based on direct experience.Responsibilities:Updating accounts receivable and issue invoicesAnalyzing reports to ensure that all customer purchases are billed accuratelyAssist in the preparation of monthly/yearly closingsSorting and scanning incoming mail to ensure that invoices are received and enteredReviewing and coding administrative invoices in online AP systemVendor management (adding new vendors, requesting & receipt of W-9)Approving employee expenses to reconcile corporate credit cardsGathering information for and aiding in the preparation of state/local sales tax returnsOther duties and special projects as requested by management Experience:2 -3 years of accounting experience or in a closely related and highly relevant fieldBachelor’s in Accounting or FinanceFirm grasp of basic and intermediate accounting principlesStrong Microsoft Excel knowledgeStrong analytical skillsAbility to work in a fast-paced environmentWillingness to learn and take on new responsibilitiesExperience with Netsuite a big plusEqual Opportunity Employer/Veterans/DisabledTo read our Candidate Privacy Information Statement, which explains how we will use your information, please The Company will consider qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records
